ilog.cplex

Class IloCplex.CutManagement

  • java.lang.Object
    • ilog.cplex.IloCplex.CutManagement
  • Enclosing class:
    IloCplex

    public static class IloCplex.CutManagement
extends java.lang.Object
    Enumeration of possible values to specify how CPLEX should treat a cut.

    These values can be used in the method UserCutCallback.add or in the method LazyConstraintCallback.add.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int UseCutFilter
      The cut is treated exactly as cuts generated by CPLEX.
      static int UseCutForce
      The cut is added to the relaxation and remains there.
      static int UseCutPurge
      The cut is added to the relaxation, but can be purged later if CPLEX determines that the cut is ineffective.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      IloCplex.CutManagement()

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    • Field Detail

      • UseCutForce

        public static final int UseCutForce
        The cut is added to the relaxation and remains there.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • UseCutPurge

        public static final int UseCutPurge
        The cut is added to the relaxation, but can be purged later if CPLEX determines that the cut is ineffective.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • UseCutFilter

        public static final int UseCutFilter
        The cut is treated exactly as cuts generated by CPLEX.

        In other words, the cut is filtered through the CPLEX process; it may not even be added to the relaxation; for example, if other cuts are deemed more effective, or if the cut is too dense, or for other similar reasons.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

        public IloCplex.CutManagement()
